body:
Comment 4 by **hut66au**: 
To compile your program, try the following script

#!/bin/sh
export GOROOT=${HOME}/go
export GOOS=darwin
export GOARCH=amd64
6g -I /opt/local/lib/gopkg $1.go
6l -L /opt/local/lib/gopkg $1.6
./6.out

call it "compile.sh" and use it this way:

./compile mytest

if your file is called mytest.go
